title: Course Hunter
description: Course Hunter is a full-stack web application that allows students to browse university courses, view ratings, and get detailed course information.
üì° Backend: Built with Spring Boot, providing RESTful APIs for course management, user authentication, and ratings.
üñ•Ô∏è Frontend: Developed with React (Vite) and Tailwind CSS, offering a modern and responsive user interface.
‚ö° Database & Caching: MySQL for relational data, Redis for fast caching.
üîê Security: Uses Spring Security and JWT for authentication.

title: Othello
description: This is a simple Othello game built with React and Spring Boot. It supports both two-player local matches and games against a basic computer opponent.
The frontend leverages extensive state management techniques, with BoardContext being utilized to efficiently manage the overall state of the application.
On the backend, there's no database involvement; instead, the game logic is powered by the MiniMax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning, providing a straightforward AI opponent for single-player games.

title: simple search
description: This is an extremely simple search engine built with Spotify Annoy and SBERT Embeddings. It is designed for fast similarity search and is implemented using FastAPI.
Embedding Model: SBERT Model: all-mpnet-base-v2 from Sentence Transformers

title: PanEMO
description: Emotion detection system for SemEval 2025 Task 11.
Framework: huggingface, transformers, torch, pandas, numpy, sklearn
